wikitext.*:
[[Image:Sagan om ringen 1959.png|thumb|Cover of the 1959 ''Sagan om ringen'']]
On [[7 July]] [[1960]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[H.W. Donner]]'''.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Christina Scull]], [[Wayne G. Hammond]]|articleurl=http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html|articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology|dated=|website=HS|accessed=14 June 2013}}</ref><ref name=Abo>[http://trip.abo.fi/cgi-bin/thw?%24{base}=brevsam&%24{maxpage}=51&%24{html}=postlist&%24{oohtml}=postlist&%24{tripshow}=format%3Dwww&%24{snhtml}=nosyn&%24{ccl}=def+sort+max%3D10000&%24{freetext}=tolkien&avs&mot&samling&%24{andor}=and&%24{sort}=samling%2Cavs Search results for "Tolkien"], at [http://trip.abo.fi/ Trip databases at Åbo Akademi University] (accessed 23 December 2011)</ref><ref>Personal research by [[User:Morgan]] (communication with Johan Olin)</ref>

*'''Subject(s):''' Tolkien disliked the cover illustration of the Swedish translation of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' (''[[Härskarringen|Sagan om ringen]]'', 1st Swedish edition [[1959]]).<ref>Johan Olin, [http://twitter.com/ardamir Ardamir (Twitter)], tweets from 9 December and 17 December 2011</ref>
*'''Publication:''' None. The letter is kept in the collections of the [[Wikipedia:Åbo Akademi University|Åbo Akademi University]].<ref name=Abo/>
*'''Comments:''' The cover was illustrated by Rolf Lagerson.<ref>[[Anders Stenström|Beregond, Anders Stenström]], "Tolkien in Swedish Translation: from ''Hompen'' to ''Ringarnas herre''", in ''[[Translating Tolkien: Text and Film]]'' (ed. [[Thomas M. Honegger]]), pp. 115-124</ref>
{{references}}
